content:
Craft an item of type: note_block
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "crimson_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 24}, {"type": "stripped_jungle_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 33}, {"type": "item_frame", "quantity": 55, "index": 34}, {"type": "acacia_stairs", "quantity": 62, "index": 36}, {"type": "stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 21, "index": 38}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 35, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft a note block I first need to craft jungle planks, which require a stripped jungle log. I have one in my inventory at slot 29, so I'll move it to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

thought: To craft a note block I need to place redstone in the middle of the crafting table and surround it with planks. The planks can be of any type, so I will start by moving the oak plank in slot 24 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 24 to slot 1 with quantity 1
